Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI can be more specific to sections of the work and instant feedback not feedback after you have submitted.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from teacher can be embarrassing because they are an actual person but AI feedback is more impartial and work focussed.
